thread.title: The Funniest Twitter Reactions to 'Moonlight' Winning Best Picture at the Oscars
thread.title_full: The Funniest Twitter Reactions to 'Moonlight' Winning Best Picture at the Oscars

author: Erica Gonzales
title: The Funniest Twitter Reactions to 'Moonlight' Winning Best Picture at the Oscars
text:
In an unreal turn of events, the Academy Award for Best Picture went to La La Land —by accident. The award ultimately went to Moonlight , after presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway read from the wrong winning card.
pic.twitter.com/lWUVQbBU46
— GQ Magazine (@GQMagazine) February 27, 2017
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The cast of Moonlight was as shocked as the audience at the ceremony and at home. Read the best reactions from viewers on Twitter below.
Everyone watching the #Oscars rn pic.twitter.com/hgAjw5A6VB
— kelsey murray (@kelseyemurray) February 27, 2017
